title: Create resumes_final.csv with 130 rows
description: Create lecture_2/data/resumes_final.csv with same structure as Resume.csv (ID,Resume_str,Resume_html,Category). Filter Resume.csv to include only the 130 IDs that match the PDFs in final_resumes directory (120 IT + 10 non-IT). Use IDs for filtering, not Category column.

title: Analyze 30 IT resumes to identify common tools and technologies
description: Manually review approximately 30 IT resume PDFs from lecture_2/data/ITResume/ and create a document listing the common tools, technologies, programming languages, frameworks, and skills found across these resumes. Save findings in lecture_2/data/it_tech_analysis.md

title: Create final_resumes directory with 130 PDFs
description: Create lecture_2/data/final_resumes/ directory. Copy all 120 IT resume PDFs from ITResume/ plus the 10 selected non-IT resume PDFs (total 130 files). Verify each PDF exists and matches an ID that will be in resumes_final.csv

title: Create resume screening notebook in lecture_2/notebooks/
description: Create lecture_2/notebooks/resume_screening.ipynb that demonstrates vertical slices and modular design. Use utils.py pattern from lecture_1. Build a resume screener that matches candidates to the job req. Focus on demonstrating well-defined inputs/outputs and building vertical slices first.

title: Select 10 random non-IT resumes from multiple categories
description: From Resume.csv, identify and select 10 random resume IDs from non-INFORMATION-TECHNOLOGY categories. Aim for diversity across categories (CHEF, AUTOMOBILE, APPAREL, etc.). Save the selected IDs to a file for tracking.

title: Add slides about modular design and vertical slices to lecture_2.tex
description: Add new slides to lecture_2/slides/lecture_2.tex about building systems with well-defined inputs/outputs, vertical vs horizontal slices, and modular decomposition. Use TOC formatting from lecture_1.tex (AtBeginSection, tableofcontents). Do not delete existing content. Add new section after existing sections.

title: Draft job requisition based on IT resume analysis
description: Using the technology analysis from the previous task, draft a realistic IT job requisition that these candidates would apply for. Include required skills, preferred qualifications, and job description. Save as lecture_2/data/job_req.md
